comments: He was very helpful. He always worked with me. There is no reason you should not get an A in this class if you put in the effort.
He was an excellent professor, and I learned a lot from him. He is very helpful, and gives you everything you need to succeed. I recommend him highly!!

Mr. Johnson, is a great professor. He made college skills easy to understand. He gives you all the tools you need to pass his class, but you have to use them. I recommend Lionel Johnsons class to everyone who wants to learn how succeed in college.

Mr. Johnson class is one the easiest class that I enjoyed. He cover everything needed to learn in everyday English but didn\'t try to overwhelm us with unnecessary work. If you turn in your work on time you will not have a problem. When you don\'t understand something he makes his time available to your schedule. Rated #1 Teacher in his profession.

Fun Class. Mr. Johnson is easy to get along with. This class will teach you about skills needed to succeed in college. Mr. Johnson is willing to explain and allows you to express yourself. Just do as instructed and you will easily make an A.
